title: First DevLog
shortDescription: This is the first log on this website.

content.value: This is my first ever log on my website. this log is about the website its self.
I have made this website over a week. i first made a sketch of how i wanted my website to look.

I made a new logo that fits my style, and i even bouth the arachneia.com domain on squerespace and i designd the website thair, but it cost 200nok or 20usd a month to have a squerespace to host the website.
So i programd it myself from scrath.
the image above is of my sketch for my website.
